title: [Bad] You grant Snapchat license to use your content.

tosdr.case: [Bad] You grant Snapchat license to use your content.-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr:
You grant Snapchat license and sublicense to use your content…  to host, store, use, display, reproduce, modify, adapt, edit, publish, and distribute that content….
...to create derivative works from, promote, exhibit, broadcast, syndicate, publicly perform, and publicly display that content in any form and in any and all media or distribution methods...
... you also grant Snapchat and their business partners the right and license to use your name, likeness, and voice. This means that you will not be entitled to any compensation from Snapchat or their business partners if your name, likeness, or voice is used.
